TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HandleExternalEventActivity extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity implements class System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity, class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener`1<class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.QueueEventArgs>, class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider
Public Class HandleExternalEventActivity Inherits Activity Implements IActivityEventListener(Of QueueEventArgs), IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider, IEventActivity

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 定義工作流程通訊活動，用於處理由本機服務引發的事件。

span.span: Defines a workflow communication activity that is used to handle an event that is raised by a local service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 本機服務是一種類別，可實作本機服務介面 (標示有 的介面)，並會加入到 。A local service is a class that implements a local service interface (an interface that is marked with ) and is added to the . 會在 服務以衍生自 的事件資料引發事件時接收資料。The receives data when the service raises an event with event data derived from . 是封鎖的活動。The is a blocking activity. 衍生自 的類別不應實作 介面，因為衍生類別無法正確執行。Classes that derive from should not implement the interface because the derived class does not execute correctly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立與設定 類別的值。The following code example shows how to create and set values for the class. 這個程式碼範例是 DocumentApprovalWorkflow.cs 檔案中＜RaiseEventToLoadWorkflow SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the RaiseEventToLoadWorkflow SDK sample from the DocumentApprovalWorkflow.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[引發事件來載入工作流程](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/71330ada-adcd-42a9-8b38-468d8a0cfb80)。For more information, see [Raise Event To Load Workflow](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/71330ada-adcd-42a9-8b38-468d8a0cfb80). [!code-csharp[wf_samples#160](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets11.cs#160)] [!code-vb[wf_samples#160](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets11.vb#160)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken CorrelationToken { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property CorrelationToken As CorrelationToken

public: virtual property System::Workflow::Runtime::CorrelationToken ^ CorrelationToken { System::Workflow::Runtime::CorrelationToken ^ get(); void set(System::Workflow::Runtime::CorrelationToken ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定對 的繫結。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding to a .

value.span: 這個屬性用於根據事件的承載，將事件與正確的 繼承活動相互關聯。

span.span: This property is used to correlate an event to the correct -inherited activity based on the payload of the event.

value.span: 例如，當單一工作流程執行個體同時接聽相同事件的多個執行個體時，使用 屬性將事件路由至該工作流程執行個體中的適當活動。

span.span: For example, when a single workflow instance is listening for multiple instances of the same event at the same time, the property is used to route the event to the proper activity in that workflow instance.

value.span: 這種相互關聯不應與將事件與正確的工作流程執行個體之相互關聯混淆。

span.span: This correlation should not be confused with correlating an event to the correct workflow instance.

value.span: 透過將事件傳送到明確的工作流程執行個體，並使用 屬性適當地識別正確的工作流程執行個體，進而與正確的工作流程執行個體相互關聯。

span.span: The correlation to the correct workflow instance is done by sending the event to an explicit workflow instance and using the property to properly identify the correct workflow instance.

value.span: 如需相互關聯的範例，請參閱[相互關聯本機服務範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd)。

span.span: For an example of correlation, see the [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd).

span.span: Called just after the external event is received to allow derived classes to process the inbound before the activity closes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生類別中 方法的最常見用法，是從所接收的 處擷取成員，以設定該衍生類別活動之公用屬性的值。The most common use of the method in derived classes is to extract members from the received to set the values of the derived-classed activity's public properties. ## Examples 下列範例會示範 `OnInvoked` 方法的實作。The following example shows an implementation of the `OnInvoked` method. 這個範例來自 TaskCompleted.cs 檔案中的＜相互關聯本機服務 SDK＞範例。This example is from the Correlated Local Service SDK sample, from the TaskCompleted.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[相互關聯本機服務範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd)。For more information, see [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd). remarks.format: ## Remarks 在編譯時間用來驗證屬性之間是否正確繫結程序。Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one other. 如果沒有這個介面，會直接從屬性 getter/setter 推斷這項資訊。Without this interface, this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在編譯時間用來驗證屬性之間是否正確繫結程序。Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one other.
